field_descriptions.code: Optional. Promotion code (3-50 characters). If not provided, will be auto-generated.
field_descriptions.eligibleProductCategories: Optional. Array of product categories this promotion applies to. If empty or not provided, applies to all products.
field_descriptions.eligibleProductIds: Optional. Array of specific product IDs this promotion applies to. If empty or not provided, applies to all products.
field_descriptions.discountValue: Required. The discount amount. For percentage: 0-100, for fixed: any positive number.
field_descriptions.expirationDate: Required. ISO 8601 date format. Must be in the future.
field_descriptions.usageLimit: Required. Maximum number of times this promotion can be used (minimum 1).
field_descriptions.isActive: Optional. Boolean to enable/disable the promotion. Defaults to true.
